input_text.Prompt:
Item name:
Magnaflow 35168 Stainless Steel 2.25" Exhaust Tip

Item features:
Reduces exhaust gas pressure and enhances the performance of the exhaust system
Manufactured from high-strength stainless steel
Mirror-like finish
Easy to install
Corrosion resistant
Backed by a lifetime warranty

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This Magnaflow 35168 Stainless Steel 2.25" Exhaust Tip can reduce exhaust gas pressure and enhance the performance of the exhaust system.  It is manufactured from high-strength stainless steel with a mirror-like finish and is easy to install.  This exhaust tip is corrosion resistant and is backed by a lifetime warranty.
input_text.Response B: Magnaflow direct-fit catalytic converters are designed for easy bolt-on installation for the professional installer. Each is designed to exact the original equipment specifications. While the majority of the direct-fit catalytic converter products do not require welding, cutting, or bending, limited applications may require additional welding for optimal installation. All federal catalytic converters meet EPA requirements and are constructed from stainless steel. Unfortunately, federal catalytic converters are not legal for sale or use on vehicles registered in the state of California.

label_annotations.factors_a: no other factors other than listed.
label_annotations.factors_b: added irrelevant information that was not in the main article and incorrect information.
